articles.description: Legspinner Jeffrey Vandersay has also been included in the squad, which is without the injured Ramesh Mendis
articles.content: SLC lifts international ban on Gunathilaka, Mendis and Dickwella less than six months into suspension

articles.title: Ranji Highlights: Karnataka propelled by Karun Nair's 175, Prasidh Krishna's 6-fer | Cricbuzz.com - Cricbuzz - Cricbuzz
